All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AllCaregiverController
The AllCaregiverController contains the entire logic of the caregiver view.
AllPatientController
The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view.
AllTreatmentController
The AllTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the allTreatments view.
ApplicationSession
class for holding important data about the running session of the application Follows the Singleton pattern
Caregiver
Caregivers work in a nursing home
CaregiverDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.
ConnectionBuilder
Class for managing the Connection to the database.
DAO<T>
Interface for DAO methods
DAOFactory
Factory class for objects derived from the DAOimp class.
DAOimp<T>
abstract class for a DAO-Object Implements the Interface DAO
DateConverter
Utility class, providing Methods for converting Strings into LocalTim/Date objects.
LoginViewController
The LoginViewController contains the entire logic of the login view.
Main
the Main clss containing the logic for initializing the Programm.
MainWindowController
The MainWindowController contains the entire logic of the main window.
NewTreatmentController
The NewTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the NewTreatment view.
Patient
Patients live in a NURSING home and are treated by nurses.
PatientDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.
Person
representation of a Person
Treatment
Treatments are therapies for patients.
TreatmentController
The TreatmentController contains the entire logic of the Treatment view.
TreatmentDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.
User
Representation of a User Account
